Package de.mnl.osgi.jul2osgi.lib

Interface LogRecordHandler

public interface LogRecordHandler
Called by LogManager in order to send the LogRecord to the OSGi log service.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    process(LogManager.LogInfo logInfo)
    Asks the handler to process the record.
    void
    processBuffered(LogManager.LogInfo[] logInfos)
    Process the events from the buffer.

  • Method Details

    • process

      boolean process(LogManager.LogInfo logInfo)
      Asks the handler to process the record. If the record has successfully been processed, returns true. If the record cannot be processed, returns false. In the latter case, the record should be kept and processing should be attempted again when a new handler has been set.
      Parameters:
      logInfo - the log record
      Returns:
      the result

    • processBuffered

      void processBuffered(LogManager.LogInfo[] logInfos)
      Process the events from the buffer. In this case, the thread context isn't related with the events.
      Parameters:
      logInfos - the log infos
